==Japanese==
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|まん|が|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
/mangwa/ > /manga/.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|まんが|y=go|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|まんが|マンガ|hhira=まんぐわ|kyu=漫畫}}

# a picture drawn as one pleases without restraint (ex. [[w:Hokusai Manga|Hokusai Manga]])
# a pictorial representation which exaggerates features for comic or satirical effect; a [[caricature]]
# a story told with pictures and dialog; a [[comic]], [[manga]]
